hero.description: We're the friendly spot down the street where your dog gets pampered, played with, and styled. No stress, just tail wags.

fullCut.title: The Full Cut
fullCut.desc: Bath, blow-dry, nail trim, ear cleaning, and a haircut that makes them look like a puppy again.

bathTidy.title: Bath & Tidy
bathTidy.desc: Just the essentials! A deep clean scrub, brush out, and trimming the tricky spots (face/feet).

miniSpa.title: Mini Spa
miniSpa.desc: Perfect for quick visits. Nail grinding, teeth brushing, and a blueberry facial scrub.

review1.text: "Sofia is the only person my Golden Doodle doesn't hide from. She gave him the cutest teddy bear cut!"
review1.author: Jessica & Barnaby

review2.text: "Super quick, super friendly. My pug smells like vanilla cupcakes now. Highly recommend!"
review2.author: Marcus & Frank

footer.subtext: Give us a call or drop by. We usually have treats.

Booking.title: Book a Spot | Sofia's Grooming
Booking.subheader: Takes less than 2 minutes to book a spot.

success.title: Wags & Kisses!
success.message: We've received {petName}'s request for a {service}. We'll text you shortly to confirm!

date.title: Final Step!
date.question: When should we expect you and {petName}?
